meta.description: The man whose very grave Covid vaccine damage was declared “medical misinformation” by YouTube and whose story was spiked by the BBC speaks.

title: Vaccines? Don’t trust the Government (Vaccine Damage—Real People)
cleaned_text:
Tony Shingler did what the UK Government encouraged him to do to protect himself and his family. He accepted an AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine, believing any possible side effects to be minor.

The reality was he then spent months paralysed in hospital, diagnosed with Guillain-Barré syndrome.

Together with his wife Nicola, Tony tells his story of vaccine injury and a changed life.

It was our 2021 interview with Nicola that got UK Column banned by YouTube, less than three months before the Daily Mail published a feature on the very same case with no consequences.

opengraph.title: Vaccines? Don’t trust the Government (Vaccine Damage—Real People)
